title: Bad to the roots
description:
This game was created as part of the Global Game Jam 2023. I took on the role of one of the two developers and worked on it together with a few colleagues. My main contributions included implementing the player controls, handling animations for the player character, and various smaller tasks such as projectile behavior.

  • Player controls
  • Animation systems
  • Supporting mechanics/projectiles
  • Year: 2023
  • Platform: PC
  • Engine: Unity
